snippet: The Bulls and the Thunder have each played well this season without their star point guards. Their game Monday night will offer a look at how far they might go in the playoffs.
lead_paragraph: The Bulls and the Thunder have each played well this season without their star point guards. Their game Monday night will offer a look at how far they might go in the playoffs.

headline.main: N.B.A. Game of the Week: Teams That Cope
